name: codepush-release
description: A VSTS build/release task for releasing app updates to the CodePush service
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: CodePush service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: accessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key used to authenticate with the CodePush service

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the app you want to release an update for

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Update Contents Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file or directory that contains the content you want to release

inputs.name: appStoreVersion
inputs.label: Target Binary Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The binary version that this update is targeting (must be semver compliant)

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment you want to release the update to

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the update being released

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the release should be considered mandatory
